alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bayard, or 8 miles northeast of Fruit Cove, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fruit Cove, Ponte Vedra Beach, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, Baymeadows, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee, Bayard, Durbin and Guana River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
